c-0: ^Don't talk to me, I have more important things to do.

^(Unfortunately you're not ready for battle right now.)

^(Perhaps you will have the courage for it in the next update.)

goblinline2: ^Wait, are those coins I smell on you?

c-0: ^I'll trade you an apple if you hand over 5 coins.
^Yes! More coins! Here, take your apple.
^I'll be here if you have more coins for apples.
c-1: ^Fine, I'll be here if you change your mind.
^Fine, keep your coins. Not like you need these apples I'm willing to trade for them anyway.

goblinCombatStart: ^Are you looking for a fight? Bring it on then!

c-0: ^Alright, here you go! Now you have
^Come back if you want more coins!
c-1: ^That's okay, come back anytime if you want some!

DiaryInitial: ^It's a brand new diary I bought from Robin's shop.
^I can always count on her for all my writing needs.

b: ^I should record my daily progress with this from now on. Better take it with me.

CarrotInitial: ^It's a leftover carrot harvested from my back yard. Harvey's gardening tips really did work!
^Perhaps I'll visit his store later to thank him.

b: ^I can snack on this later. Into my bag you go.
^Better check the house again to be sure.
^I think that's everything. Time to start my journey!

BagInitial: ^It's my favourite bag! It'll come in handy in the adventures ahead.
PotInitial: ^It's a magical pot passed down from Grandpa.
^By channeling the right mana into it, I'll be able to cook up all sorts of dishes!
^...Is what I'd say, but I'll need the mana of other recipes first. Don't want to make something bland again.
^Grandpa said that people used to be able to cook without these. It's kinda hard to imagine what it's like before the Agusial Tragedy.

b: ^Anyway, I'll need this to feed myself on the road. Time to pack it up.

SwordInitial: ^This sword is an old birthday gift from Darius. "You never know when danger will approach," he says.
^My body feels sore just thinking about our weekly training sessions. It's hard to believe we're only a few years apart.

b: ^Still, I'll need this to protect myself from harm. I'll get Darius to polish it up at the local smithy later.

Map: ^It's a map of the continent of Nevrithea!
^There are plenty of farms and fields to be seen, though I doubt that's still enough to satisfy the sky-high demand for freshly grown produce.
^It took me quite a while to find Toturiel the first time I tried.
Sign2: ^Movement tip 1: Hold down shift to run!
